description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Navigate a kitten by jetpack, fueled by hopes and dreams, through a fantastical world of techno music. *New Graphics *New Levels *New Kittehs *New Music = U Can Has: 1. DREAM Featuring Frisco – Sea of Love (Hixxy Remix) 2. CLOUD Featuring Re-Con – Like A Rainbow 3. LAVA Featuring Styles & Breeze – You’re Shining 4. MEAT Featuring  F.R.E.A.K. - Hungry For Your Love + 13 NEW Kittehs!
